1.content: As much as I would like to this starting chapter will be only for deciding which kind of story we will be following.
1.title: Goddess blessing on this wonderful Story

choices: When suddenly you're stomped by a boot! (one of the girls passing by)
when a cute shopkeeper notices your small form (wiz)
You somehow make it to the guild without incident
It was actually a mansion (the main party's house)
The wind blows you off course!
11.content:
Suddenly you were in a dark room, sitting in a chair across from a beautiful girl with white hair, you don't remember what was going on before then but you didn't need to think about it for long.

The beautiful girl spoke up "I'm sorry but you've died..." She looked like she actually cared, how sweet, "but, I'm Eris Goddess of fortune, tasked with reincarnating you, either into your old world as a baby or... I could send you off to another world as long as you-"

You didn't even need to think about it, "I'll do it!" She jumpped startled from the interruption.

"but I haven't even offered you the powers yet or told you about-" She started explaining again

"Dosn't matter, give me whatever you want this will be cool whatever I get, plus I like a suprise." She looked a little miffed that you continued to interrupt her but went back to smiling. You were enveloped in light and she spoke.

"Well then, thank you for your sacrifice. I'm sure your next life will be to your liking."

Then there was a blinding flash of light and you were in the middle of a town standing on cobble stone... but there was something wrong. everything was huge! what did that goddess do, did this have something to do with that power she was talking about? Why were you so small? You shook your head, if this was a fantasy world like you thought then all it would take is getting the attention of a wizard or something to fix this, with that in mind you started heading towards a building in the distance that kind of looked like a guild hall...
11.title: Shrink Story

choices: You come loose, but someone else steps on you
111.content:
You took one step, ready to begin your journey- before a shadow fell over your tiny body. With no time to react, you just gave a weak yelp before something heavy smashed upon you with a clack. With a silent yell, you expected your soul to leave your body, back to Eris to fix this mistake, but instead you just felt your body flatten out under the girls weight. Your body smeared to the road as the foot twisted upon you, your body acting like gum as you were scraped across the ground.

It felt like forever before the foot lifted off, your body fought between the floor and the boot for a moment as you tried to grab onto the floor without luck as you came with the boot. Your cries going unheard as you were slammed down again, dirt covering your body before it lifted again. It was a never ending cycle.

After what felt like an eternity, your body was completely mangled on the girls boot before the pattern finally changed. The foot lifted and you got to glance at your unaware tormentor.

Blue hair, smooth skin and a grossed out facial expression,
"Eww- who would just leave gum around?" The girl whined. She gave a little sigh as you tried to get her attention, her foot moving again "I'm a goddess... I shouldn't have to walk these streets-"

Aqua simply scraped her foot on the street, pushing her weight onto it as she tried to scrape you off a couple of times. Unaware of your torment as she started to complain about how she's still stuck here and that she didn't have money left for alcohol and how bad her day was going. You were not paying too much attention as she scraped you harshly into the walkway.
111.title: Gummed up boot

choices: You approached the blue-haired girl "self-proclaimed goddess" (Aqua)
You got close to the blond warrior (Darkness)
113.content:
Finally you get to the guild trying to stick to the wall to avoid accidents.

There are a lot of people there, some were collecting their rewards in the windows, others saw the announcements of the missions and most of them were eating at the tables.

But there were three people who caught your attention, a blue-haired girl who seemed to be doing cheap magic tricks for a small crowd, you also felt a particular sense of danger if you approached her.

Another was a mage dressed in red and black robes, and a eye-patch, eating in a table, you didnt felt something particularly dangerous on her at least not against a creature like you, but a general risk like something that will destroy some kilometers around her like an explosion or something like that.

And a blonde warrior in white and yellow armor, who was watching the dangerous quests in the announcements board, you didn't felt any danger from her or around, but an almost unhealthy intention to seek dangers and face them at the cost of her own safety.

Great you though for yourself a girl who is dangerous herself, a girl who could be dangerous to be around, and a girl who gonna attract dangers to herself.

You didn't know why you knew this things as if this were written in favor of the script, forget that clearly it was a power granted for revive in a new world nothing unusual around here.

Also wasn't unusual that despite having many people around you, now you only have the option to choose between the three girls described in more detail, it is more if help's you with the immersion imagine that suddenly all the other people in the guild left for (insert convincing reason here) and finally also imagine that this attempt at comic writing at the style of the series did not broke your immersion already.

So you decided to approach to...
113.title: You somehow make it to the guild without incident

choices: Another girl appeared and helped Megumin (Yunyun)
You got out of the bra but Megumin had recovered a little
You where stuck for good until Megumin takes you out herself
1132.content:
You approached to the eye patched mage carefully. When you are close enough you shout to her trying to get her attention.

"Wha? What was that?" Megumin asked looking around but failing in seeing you.

Noticing that somehow worked you shouted again this time specifying where you are.

"Miss, miss down here I was shrunk somehow and I need some help"

"Huh? oh." She turned to your direction and saw you with her one eye yelping in surprise. "Wow what happened?, who are you?" Megumin Said.

"As I was saying I was shrunk somehow." You said, when someone passed close to the area you both where, creating a tremor for in which you fell on your back. "Em sorry miss could you place me in a safer position please." You said, getting up after your fell.

"Oh yeah sure sorry here get in my palm." She said lowering her hand to your side. "And you can call me Megumin by the way."

You climber her hand and walked to the center of her palm. She lifted you until you where to eye level.

"You are really small" Megumin said inspecting you thoroughly while she was thinking. Owww he so cute, I wonder if he would like to be my pet. She was caressing you the whole time while deep in though, you didn't care, even liked it, was a good change after all.

After a few minutes you decided to speak again, apparently you both immersed in the fun. "Ehem miss as I was saying I need help to get back to my normal size, could you help me somehow?" You said expectantly.

"Of course, you are in the hands of the more powerful and greatest Megumin the supreme Arch-Mage." Megumin said standing and posing a pose you didn't saw clearly since you where in her hand, but she looked confident and with a spark in her eye, and you though for yourself since she was an arch mage, surely she could help you with a spell,

"That said, I can only cast explosion spells, ¡Teehee¡" Megumin said ruining the respect you already had for her. "But please let me help you anyway I will Protect you until we find a way to restore you size." I Hope he accepts my offer I want to play with him so much, I mean protect and help him.

Not having much of an option you accepted reluctantly. "Ok Megumin I gonna accept your offer, so what we do now? you know other mages or an artifact that can help to my case?" You asked.

"No so fast buddy, first I need to do my daily practice of magic, so we gonna go to the field out of the town." Megumin said, looking around and on herself apparently seeking for a place to put you you for the time being. "Well I think I will put you in my cleavage for now, since I don't have any pockets. but please don't be a perv about it." She said grasping you between her thumb and forefinger, and pushing you between her modest meat orbs, actually you didn't had nothing that keeps you in place so you fell further down, thankfully you where catched in a rustic home made bra, made of white fabric strips.

Perv with that bust yeah sure. You though to yourself, feeling still vulnerable since you had too much space in a unstable place, you started to crawl closer to one of breast's, when you get close enough you squeeze yourself beneath the breast, finally feeling safer, Oh at the end maybe Im perving a little but is for a good reason. you reasoned with yourself.

Outside Megumin yelped when felt you under her breast, He is tickling me well I'm going to make him stop moving. She adjusted her bra by pressing it closer to her body.

You got stuck for good now, you squirmed trying to get your head out to breath, finally finding a air pocket.

Megumin satisfied now started to walk, to get out of the town.

For you a constant motion started, after a while some sweat formed and to maintain your pocket of air you started to lick.

Megumin felt this. What is he doing? well doesn't matters feels good. She squeezed her boob as a thank you.

After a while, she finally reached the field and began to enchant her spell. "From the deepest hell, the cosmic fire come to me, consuming my enemies, purifying this field. EXPLOSION!" Losing her energy she fell to the ground exhausted.

You heard a muffled enchant outside of your prison, then a far explosion muffled too, but then a big motion, an impact was a terrible experience what happened?, the explosion hit Megumin?

"Oh sorry I forgot to say to you little buddy, every time I cast an explosion spell, I deploy all my energy, so we are stuck here until someone comes or until some energy come back to me." Megumin said

This just great. You thought to yourself, you started to think about escape from this girl this just isn't going anywhere and at this rate you probably wouldn't get back to your size never.
1132.title: Under Megumin's care

1133.content:
You approached the blonde warrior, not so sure what to do next, you decided to scream to the blonde, but she was too engrossed in the notice board to hear you.

"Ah it seems I have no choice but to start climbing her." You said approaching her plate boot, it was difficult to climb because you slipped on the metal, but after a few tries you finally got some footing in the scars and small holes around the whole boot.

After a while you finally got to boot opening, when of course because is the perfect timing Darkness decided to move. Making you fall into the boot.

You fall right above her foot luckily, sadly your luck short lived because the girl continue walking making you get further and further into the boot until you reach the toes. Where you get between her big and second toe.

You get stuck and can't really move, also the heat is increasing because the movement, and if that wasn't enough, the girl started to squeeze you forcefully.

Meanwhile upstairs, Darkness didn't find a search she liked, instead she felt something in her boot that was a little annoying, that means in her case something that felt good. So she left what she assumed was a pebble there for the time being.

Great a pebble get into my boot, since I dint find a hard enough quest I think I will go to the market and buy some supplies, and with my little pebble buddy this walk gonna be a bliss. Darkness though to herself.

You in her boot, on the other hand, you were in heaven, actually no, if you were darkness you might enjoy it but it is not the case, so you were in hell, the heat, the sweat of her foot drenching on you, the constant motion, the toes squeezing and curling on you, they even pass you between each toe space. So you got the full tour after a few hours.

Finally Darkness decided ti sit for while after buy some supplies. She sat under a tree near the mansion she lived in.

She decided to check what actually fell in her boot, she took off her boot and shook its contents in her hand, she yelp in surprise when she saw a tiny human form in her palm.

"What are you ?, and why were you in my boot.? Darkness asked concerned.

Well I'm (your name) and I was trying to get your attention in the guild when I fell into your boot, and... Hello miss? are hearing me miss.? you noticed that she get lost in thought while you where explaining what happened.

"Mhm? Oh yes, yes I am sorry a noble knight is always at the service of the weak. Darkness said not very convincingly. What thinking actually was. He felt great under my foot, and he is so cute I want to keep him. I wonder if I can just drop him back in my boot and just continue adventuring. ¡No myself¡ I shouldn't think like that he is weak tiny who need's help. Wha? what he said? damn I wasn't paying attention but now that I think about it he was the one who got into my boot, maybe he liked it too.

"Well em, what did you say your name was?"

"(Your name)" You said again not very impressed.

"Right, right well what can I do for you?" Darkness asked focused this time.

"Well I shrunk mysteriously and I need help to get back to my normal size" you said letting out the resurrection thing for now

"Mhm I will see what I can do for you, for now we should get back to my home is near don't worry so I will drop you back in my boot and we..."

"Wait a minute there in your boot you said? why you wanna drop me back there?"

"Oh well because I don't have any pockets, and I need to carry some supplies I just bought" Darkness said a little surprised because she was sure that he would like the idea. Maybe he was not yet ready to accept that he liked the experience, she thought.

"Well you can travel in my cleavage if you prefer or.."
1133.title: Getting to know Darkness

choices: Go for The big breasted Crusader Darkness
Go for the Sexy Archpriestess in the skimpy cloths Aqua
The Crimson Demon is more your style, Megumin
The cute Thief that reminds you of that goddess... Chris
The sexy Shop keeper or even the guild girl
12.content:
Suddenly you were in a dark room, sitting in a chair across from a beautiful girl with white hair, you don't remember what was going on before then but you didn't need to think about it for long.

The beautiful girl spoke up "I'm sorry but you've died..." She looked like she actually cared, how sweet, "but, I'm Eris Goddess of fortune, tasked with reincarnating you, either into your old world as a baby or... I could send you off to another world as long as you-"

You didn't even need to think about it, "I'll do it!" She jumped startled from the interruption.

"but I haven't even offered you the powers yet or told you about-" She started explaining again

"Doesn't matter, give me whatever you want this will be cool whatever I get, plus I like a surprise." She looked a little miffed that you continued to interrupt her but went back to smiling. You were enveloped in light and she spoke.

"Well then, thank you for your sacrifice. I'm sure your next life will be to your liking."

... That had been a month ago. If only you had listened to her maybe you could have gotten the hang of your power before hand. It was the ability to change into any object that you have touched before. The power did have a sort of cooldown and you couldn't shift into something you didn't have room to turn into plus you only had as much range of motion as the object itself. This seemed to be supposed to be used to transform into golems or something but you had a MUCH better idea of how to go about using it.

There were plenty of cute girls in the town and this was the perfect way to get close to them, you only needed the opportunity to swap out with something they wear. first you just needed to pick your target cutie.
12.title: Transformation Story

123.content:
It had been a month worth preparing. Sure you could use your new amazing abilities to help fight the demon king but why do that when there were cute girls to go after. Surely you wouldn't have been given such a perfect gift if this was not what it's intended use was. What was the worst that could happen right?

The first place to look was naturally going to be the tavern at the guild, that's where all the action seemed to happen after all. You slinked in and took a seat towards the back as you stared at the wide array of different women that came and went from the building. There were plenty of options but one particular group was your primary target. The group of no good heroes that had come together not to long ago. Sure they had shown themselves to be competent when they saved the city but the vast array of things that they haven't done both for themselves and the city spoke to their ineffectiveness. So why this particular group then. Well cause they were hot of course.

You had a choice of either the load and admittedly obnoxious blue haired and self proclaimed goddess, a "prize" whose panties existence had been a topic of debate more times than once. The strange to be sure crusader whose love for pain and cup size have also been a topic of discussion with several of the people you've met. And finally the most normal of the group, not that that meant much, the crimson demon who waved an explosive stave around like it wasn't a tool to cause mass destruction. She was pretty and sane, what more did you really need right?

Now it just became a matter of how you would get yourself into position. You had spent some time practicing and you had pretty effectively narrowed down a way to, at the very least, get her to take you with her to her home. Anything after that would be much simpler. The first, and likely one of the more difficult options, would be to transform into her staff after getting it away from her but that may be easier said than done. Another would be to splash some sort of beverage on her and try to pat her dry, touching her bra in the process and transforming when she went to change. And the final was wait for her to try and air out her boots after they got settled down and make a quick switch when you had the opportunity. After that it was as easy as letting her take you right back to her room where you could have free range to look at or be anything you liked. The only question was how to take that first step.
123.title: The Crimson Demon is more your style, Megumin

choices: They Head Out for Another Adventure
Megumin Notices These Boots Feel Different
1233.content:
Obviously the move would be to go for the boots right? Naturally the best way to sneak into her home with her would be to be the thing she has on her at all times, I mean aside from clothing. So the perfect plan was put into action devised with pure intellect and skill. And of course by that you meant waiting for her to pop them off her feet, wait for her comrades to get drunk on ale and sneak your way under the table and make your move. Fullproof.

And that was just what you did, it didn't take long for the blue haired goddess to spend away a small fortune on alcohol and completely give herself away to it. The other two were not far behind and soon the two had a small crowd around them celebrating a whole lot of nothing. And then your moment arrived, either due to the heat of the moment or the literal heat of being around that many drunks the crimson demon Megumin tugged and removed the two boots before letting them drop under the table. Now came the hard part. With the grace of a swan you stood up and walked by the small crowd before "tripping" and sliding beneath the table. It was slightly hard dodging the many legs now occupying the space but as soon as you touched the crimson demons boots you tossed them aside and used you gift to take their place. Now all you would have to do is wait a bit and your in into the mansion of cities was a sure fire thing.



It took longer than you expected for the girl to return to her boots but eventually she decided they must have aired out enough. You waited excitedly as you felt yourself shuffle around and then watched as a black stockinged foot came into view over one of your eyes and a pair of hands gripped the openings to one of your boot bodies. It was finally your time! And as the foot slowly slipped into the opening one thing became clear. This was a mistake. A huge mistake. The scent that wafted from the stocking was in itself awful. As soon as the foot landed on the insole you could taste the salty sweat trapped within a piece of clothing that had been stuck to her leg for a whole day of adventuring. The taste of her sweat filled your whole mouth and the scent seemed to consume you. And as if that wasn't enough you had to watch in horror as her other bandage wrapped foot slowly slipped into the other half of your body now sealing you in darkness along with the stench and taste of her feet consuming you. Finally the pressure of her standing up only succeeded in squeezing the sweat from the cloth into your body even more. This was a bad idea, a very very bad idea.
1233.title: Take that first step (Boot/boots)

choices: She Might Need Some Stockings After That Shower
Explore One of the Other Girls Rooms
This Is Crazy You Have to Get Out of Here
12331.content:
Megumin walked through the town wit a bit of a pout and a sigh. Part of her wished that she could join in on the drinking and the fun that her fellow party members took part in so frequently. Then she remembered the way Aqua would make an absolute fool of herself and she was glad she never tried more than once or twice. One thing that she was not thankful for, however, was the much to long walk back to the mansion. Her feet were already sweltering from a day of running around looking for the perfect target for a fiery cleansing and the fact she wore these tight boots were not helping. Sure she had given them a breath of fresh air at the tavern but even walking for such a short time had quickly caused them to begin emitting waves of heat into their tiny confines once more. All she had to do was get back home and she could finally take a break.


You were in hell. Somewhat ironic considering the reason for this was a demon with bright red eyes but for some reason the irony wasn't very funny at this moment in time. No right now you were much to busy trying not to vomit the contents of your nonexistent stomach from your nonexistent mouth from the stench and taste of death coming from the small girls feet. It was amazing that something that appeared so dainty and cute was able to completely destroy two of your five senses, three if you counted the total darkness they left you in, so easily with nothing more than a little pressure and a wiggle every now and again. God those wiggling toes, all they succeeded in doing was slide around or grind in the slick sweat that oozed from them almost endlessly. Every step pressed you into her foot causing a new gushing of the salty liquid to absorb into your body. If you could just undo your transformation and leave the girl without boots you would in a second but the cooldown and lack of space prevented that. You had no options but just endure her smelly feet.


Eventually she finally did arrive home with a loud sigh before retiring to her gothic looking room. She popped you off of her feet which did little to remedy the horrible sweat stench she had left you with but did somewhat remedy the horrible sweltering heat. Still it wasn't much of a benefit considering your body had been so firmly saturated in the sticky salty sweat of the crimson demons feet.You could hear the sounds of her changing, pulling the tainted clothing from her body before she left the room. You could only hope it was to take a shower. Still after nearly an hour of being a boot and now finally free from her sweltering feet you could become something else and get away from those stink machines. And on top of that no one was in the home, you could become anything for any of the cuties. But what to choose.
12331.title: Megumin Walks Home

choices: The Bathroom? And someone is taking a bath?
123313.content:
The other girls of the party were also fairy sexy, and the further away from those skunk feet you were, the better. You turn into a fly and start flying around. At first, turning into a fly was a disorienting thing but, with a little practice, you managed to adapt to it. It was an amazing form of transportation combined with stealth, allowing you to scout anything and everything.

You flew through the mansion looking through rooms and eventually found yourself in...
123313.title: Explore One of the Other Girls Rooms

1234.content:
There was a couple other things to transform into that would basically get you free access onto her body. One of them was her eyepatch. You hadn’t thought of a plan yet but you knew that both her eyes were operational meaning you wouldn’t be damming yourself to looking at an empty socket. Another viable thing to transform into would be her hat. The best way to take the hat off would be to just grab it, run into an alleyway, toss the hat then transform on the floor. It would also be an escape trick for the ages.

Which of these would be best to go for though...
1234.title: Other

125.content: this is a choice to chapter unfortunatly but it ends here
125.title: The sexy Shop keeper or even the guild girl

1253.content: There are more females than Yuyun!
1253.title: More than Yuyun!

12533.content: Should it be the girl from the second ova?
12533.title: Ron?

13.content: Lets start with the main cast and go down from there.
13.title: Character Shrink Story

choices: Kazuma's been squashed too thin, Aqua assumes he's gone.
Aqua tries to wash off Kazuma again
131.content:
Kazuma swore as he tried to grab Aqua's attention from the end table, beside the couch he planned to sit on.
"Aquaaaa!" He cried out, watching her walk past drinking a glass of water. Infuriatingly, she put the empty glass on the table Kazuma was trying to get her attention from.

How Kazuma got to be only a few centermeters in height was a total mystery. He couldn't think of a single reason off the top of his head and worst of all, the only person around at the moment was Aqua who was getting ready to go out. He scowled up at Aqua for a moment, before taking out his bow, "You leave me no choice-" He spoke, secretly happy to jump to this conclusion as he knocked in an arrow. "Snipe-"

The poor goddess just finished doing her hair in the mirror before something stung her ass- almost like a light flick but still annoying.
"Wh-what?" She turned around, the same feeling this time on the nose. "Ouch- hey what the he-"

"Snipe, snipe, snipe, snipe, snipe" Kazuma kept saying, hitting the goddess multiple times until her teary eyes locked onto him. "Ah-" He managed to say- his eyes widening slightly as he saw her familier angry pout storm towards him- right before her hand slammed down on him.

Aqua wiped the tears from her eyes,
"What kinda bug even has projectiles-" She whimpered, looking at her hand to see the bugs splattered remains. "Gross- a goddess shouldn't need to deal with mear bugs- get off" The blue haired girl frowned, rubbing her thumb over the stain- but it only seemed to spread the bug body out.

She wiped her hand on her skirt a couple of times with a sigh, now in a bad mood as she checked her hand again.

Little did she know, the bug was infact not dead- nore was it a bug. Kazuma quickly found out about his newfound invincibility in the worst possible way.

Splattered and stretched on the goddess's hand, he couldn't even twitch as she obliterated him from existance on her skirt before looking at him once more.
131.title: Kazuma Shrinks

choices: Wipe Kazuma off onto Darkness's sweat rag
Pull Kazuma off (Noticing how stretchy he is)
Get distracted and wipe Kazuma onto her bare thigh
1313.content:
"Jeez- come on-" Aqua complained, not hearing Kazuma's cries as she licked her other hands thumb before pressing the wet digit back down on him.

The spit covered digit ran over him a couple of times- his senses getting overwhelmed by the spit and pressure as he tried again to yell or use an ability. He sadly, had no such luck as the goddess above huffed. "What kind of bug even is this..." She sighed, wiping away a purified tear- not noticing it almost drowning the bug as she wandered towards the bathroom to wash her hands. Her eyes wandered down however as she noticed a couple of things that might help.

Poor Kazuma could only wait as she decided what to do.
1313.title: Aqua tries to wash off Kazuma again

choices: Hop off when she puts it down
13131.content:
"Gross gross gross- ah-" Aqua paused, noticing a rag abandoned on the floor. She casually picked it up, noticing a faint musky smell from it, before wiping down her hand as she wandered towards the kitchen. The goddess checked her hand before sighing with content at her now clean hand- she gave it a little sniff before looking slightly displeased "Maybe I'll wash my hands anyway-" She mumbled, tossing the rag onto the counter.

What had been a mundane task had been a knightmare for poor Kazuma as his sky was blotted out by the cloth. He barely had time to say anything witty before the blanket of musk hit him.
"G-god- that smell- A-Aqqqaaaa!" He whimpered, before the horrid smelling thing landed ontop of him. He felt Aqua's finger tip narrow in on his location as his mind was scrambled from the stench of the rag- some strange liquid started to seep out, further obliterating his thoughts as she scrubbed him off.

He twitched as the rag lifted away, taking him with it as he struggled to even move. He barely managed to turn his head after being plopped down on the table, just in time to see Aqua leave. He slowly closed his eyes.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------

He awoke to chatter, groaning slightly as he opened his eyes again. He lay still as he slowly arched his head around the room.

He saw Yunyun talking to someone out of his sight. The smelly wall of cloth blocking his vision. Kazuma tried to move, but the surface of the rag seemed to pin him down. He sighed, looking blankly forward before his world suddenly lifted upwards. His eyes met Darkness's as she scanned the rag.
"Weird, how did it get all the way over here?" Darkness boomed overhead, as Kazuma attempted to get her attention. The tiny micro shuddered as Darkness's mouth came uncomfortably close, making it clear how easy Darkness could eat him without noticing. Sniffing sounds came from high above before the mouth formed a frown, backing away.

It was then that Kazuma realised he should start yelling again, the masochists lips distracting him. Yet as he tried, she deafened him out again.
"It'll have to do, I need to wash some more sweat rags. There's no way I can do the gym without wiping down my chest- it just- builds up a bit too much" Darkness blushed, stopping Kazuma from yelling again for a moment as his eyes glanced down towards her chest. "Sopping wet with sweat, unable to mop it down as it slowly makes my shirt transparent- what if someone see's and it opens the gates of a beast-" Darkness panted, wiggling happily at the thought for a moment before smiling, "Then finally, I need to use my sweat rag to mop up my cleavage, then those beasts doors will burst open wider- causing them to- ah-" Darkness flushed red, wagging happily as she drooled.
"D-do you really think guys do that?" Yunyun looked nervous,
"O-of course! It's only natural- but I'll be your shield from them if anything happens-" Darkness cleared her throat. "B-besides, nothings ever actually happened to me during my workouts" She spoke so reassuringly, but with a far more monotone voice, laced with disappointment.

Meanwhile, Kazuma's gate was half open as he watched Darkness's chest wag infront of him.
"Oho... it wouldn't be my fault if I ended up there-" He hugged himself while playing out the scene "No Darkness, that stupid Aqua stuck me here- I didn't mean to! Ah- wait- maybe not- how about 'I had no choice! I know it's highly unlikely but I wound up directly in your cleavage!' No... perhaps... I should just enjoy myself then never mention this part to anyone" Kazuma nodded a couple of times as the rag shifted again- her powerful grip reminding him of the dangers of his new size.

Additionally, he finally started to feel his restraints come undone. He'd need to grab on to stay on.
13131.title: Wipe Kazuma off onto Darkness's sweat rag

choices: Megumin gets going, Aqua's fine for now
Megumin pretends to be sick to find out why aqua shrunk
Megumin gets going but remembers to bring the instructions to help aqua
132.content:
The party was supposed to be getting ready for a quest right now that would take them about a week to do, although technically it didn't need all of them so Aqua had graciously volunteered to stay behind. She wasn't currently in any debt and Kazuma had even lent her a decent amount for her week alone, she could totally buy some top tier booze with this much, but as she dreamed about what her week would be like she noticed Megumin staring at her from out of a side door. When Aqua looked at her she waved for her to come into the room, and confused Aqua wandered in wondering what the younger girl could want from her. What she found though was the crimson demon holding a weird paper.

"uhh, What are you doing in here Megumin" She was immediately suspicious since anything Megumin was doing probably had something to do with explosions.

"I found a magic item that's supposed to increase my mana but after I bought it the instructions said I need a partner to use it. Since nobody else has a lot of magic you're the only one that can help me! Please great Aqua!" Aqua of course could not just say no when someone inflated her ego like that.

"Well if it's got to be me nobody else will do, Hahaha! uh, what do I need to do."

Megumin took out a brush with some paint on it. "You just let me draw a the circle on your palm with the magic paint and then it links up with the one i drew on me and then we both touch the paper" Megumin explained as she took aqua's hand and drew a relatively simple shape on it. Then she put the paper on the ground and had Aqua touch it with the symbol and then Megumin put her foot on the paper, which Aqua only then noticed wasn't covered in the usual bandages. There was a brief flash and then Aqua was confused as she was now standing with her hand touching a wall of flesh that faintly smelled bad.

"EW! What is this thing" She tried to pull her hand off but found it was stuck. "What's going on! Help, Megumin! KAZUMA!" She felt the wall drag her forward a little as it shifted.

"SHHH! Aqua, don't freak out so bad. I don't know what went wrong but it kinda feels like it worked? I can feel a lot of mana flowing in." Aqua looked up to see Megumin's Giant face looking down at her, that means that the thing she was stuck to.. She looked to the side to see some wiggling digits and started to immediately freak out again.

"Why am I small! Undo it! HELP! KA-" She was silanced this time by the giant foot turning over on her and pinning her to the ground filling all the available space with foot.

"We can't tell Kazuma! He'll totally never buy me anything again if I messed this up bad." The water goddess really couldn't care less about that she was just concerned with fixing it but she couldn't scream although her muffled cries were still quite loud. Megumin didn't let her up until she stopped shouting.

"Don't worry Aqua I'll fix everything, I just have to read the instructions again." She pulled out a little paper booklet while Aqua continued trying to yank herself off of the foot. Unfortunately for the little goddess though a knock on the door spooked Megumin who jumped to her feet as the door opened obliterating her under the crimson demon's foot. Although she didn't break she just kind of flattened out, the ball of the other girls foot pressing her flat.

"What's taking you so long! Get your shoes on we are gonna be late for the carriage." That was Kazuma, she couldn't stall for much longer...
132.title: Aqua in a bind

choices: Megumin decided that Aqua can wait until the quest is over
Megumin still tries to help, maybe that 'transfer' thing could help
Aqua is so demolished Megumin has a hard time distinguishing her from her foot.
1323.content:
Megumin checked the bottom of her foot to find the sticker like form of Aqua starting to peel her face off, which meant she was alive but it also meant she would start shouting her head off if she left her for too long. With limited time to figure out what to do she silently apologized to the small arch priest and wrapped her signature bandages over aqua and the rest of her leg pressing her into place against the younger girls foot. Aqua tried everything within her power to get out of the situation but pinned as she was with her mouth wide open from screaming and she couldn't even bite the offending foot. things only got worse when Megumin put her boots on trapping Aqua in with the lingering smell of hundreds of uses. Even the change from sitting to standing was a ridiculous amount of pressure on her smashed form with the ball of the foot right on her head the slightest move pressed her down giving her a headache and scraping her tongue along just a little bit farther. In the short time it took Megumin to walk from her room to the carrage Aqua felt the sweat building up and being drawn strait to her! As a water goddess her plea for help was drawing in all the moisture from the humid shoes.

droplets formed and slipped under her flattened body to give just enough room while she wasn't being stomped for her to accidentally drink the droplet before the foot fell again and squeezed her back into a sticker just a little more spread out and a little thinner. With Megumin now sitting in the cart, about five minutes had passed but to the foot trapped goddess it felt like at least an hour of trampling, thankfully there was less stomping but the bandages were preventing her from un-flattening. The sweat however was a never ending torrent practically with the flavor of dirty foot only just barely mitigated by her natural purification. Aqua screamed against the foot causing a slight buzzing now that she wasn't flat against it, which tickled Megumin, who, without thinking stomped her foot down to suppress the tingling sensation obliterating Aqua once more with just a simple motion.

Topside Megumin and Darkness sat in the back of the carriage while Kazuma drove, "What kind of horrible beasts do you think we'll face this time Megumin, Perhaps a dragon with acidic breath, or maybe even a Giant that could [b]stomp[/b] me underfoot. Aren't you excited to try the items Kazuma got us?" Darkness asked the eye patched crimson demon

Megumin was trying to understand the instructions on her leaflet once more when darkness had started talking, but it spoke in vague euphemisms and didn't seem to explicitly have a counter spell that she could use without using skillpoints on it and all of hers were already invested in more explosion damage the closest she was finding was a 'transfer' rune to move the 'divine source' to enhance different attributes. She looked up startled when Darkness asked her a question directly. "Oh uh, yeh I'm hoping it works too, although I might need some help eventually if you'd like to see if I can use mine to enhance other stuff if we need." Darkness had expected an enthusiastic reply about how she would one shot a dragon with her explosion magic, it seemed something was really bothering her.

"If you think so." there was an awkward silence for a moment before they heard Kazuma's voice from the front and the carriage stopped prompting both girls to jump out and see what happened. Carelessly once more Megumin destroyed Aqua's form beneath her foot, if she didn't know she was down there already she might not have even felt her. As it turned out the reason they had stopped was because a giant gang of goblins had set up a block on the road. Megumin stepped up.

"ufufu, let me show you the might of my explosion magic, I'll take them all out in one shot!" someone mumbled something about only having one shot off to the side but she ignored the jab for now planting her feet she now felt the slight squish of the blue haired girl under her foot. [b]"Oh powers of the cosmos, and powers of the earth gather from above and below to bestow your power onto me your chosen servant! Grant me the power to smite all who stand before me and grind them under the heel of your almighty strength! EXPLOSION!"[/b] The force pressed her into the ground as the ball of energy launched from the tip of her staff grinding Aqua slightly more into her foot as a wonderful sensation of mana flowing into her body from the point of contact allowed her to stay standing. Aqua meanwhile felt the sensation of her essence being drained into the soul of the foot pressing down on her, like drain touch but if it was also a giant foot covering her whole body. Megumin stood for a few moments more simply grinding her foot into the ground as if she was trying to squeeze the mana out faster without even realizing what she was doing. When she finally did snap out of it she started jumping for joy!

"It worked finally it worked! I even tried to put all my mana into that but i'm still standing! I bet I could fire another one right now." She happily chirped unintentionally pounding the source of her new mana pool farther into paste. Aqua was more destroyed by the mana drain than the stomping though, she whimpered wondering what she had done to deserve this.

14.content: and Who Transforms out of the characters?
14.title: Character Transformation Story

choices: Wait- can I transform myself? (Turns into something, can't revert)
Megumin sneaks in with a prank idea
141.content:
"Bad things always happen to good people" Kazuma spoke- looking glum as the woman infront sorted out the paperwork.
"I think you got off light- you were supposed to be executed for your crimes. If your friend didn't have high connections you wouldn't even have this option..." The woman spoke, coughing slightly. "Admittedly, I've never seen this technique before- let alone to request it for your release... but that's the Dustiness family for you...

Kazuma winced as the woman finished writing the forms- she ushered him to come forward a bit. He edged forward a little as she copied a mark she saw in a book.
"What is this punishment anyway...?" Kazuma stated, looking not too worried. The woman coughed,
"It's an odd request... the girl we spoke to was very happy to of discovered such a spell but it requires so many resources and magic that she simply couldn't get access to. She seemed... too happy to get the chance to test it on someone"

Kazuma nodded,
"Ah- was that Darkness?" He asked,
"Yes- she sure is a strange one- even put money towards the state doing such a thing... but it is better then execution. We did actually offer your freedom but after explaining a few punishments she started to come up with some very twisted ideas for you." the woman looked worried, "Honestly, a perminant curse like this was probably the nicest one..." She finished up, stamping Kazuma's head with a talisman.

Kazuma looked a little surprised before everything clicked together,
"WAIT, WAIT, WAIT! Darkness came up with the punishment?! Are you sure she wasn't asking for it herself?" He yelled out, the woman looked surprised,
"I thought that at first but... who would..." She started, watching Kazuma try to rip off the talisman- but it was too late.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------

Kazuma came out of the reception looking like death. A mark on his forhead showing his punishment and a document to say he was free.
"A-ahhh-" Darkness looked sheepish as she recognised the mark "I- was wondering why it took so long to get you through- I see they made a mix up..." She stated, a jealous look on your forhead "When she said they could do it I kind of expected..."

Kazuma just glared at her, but it only made Darkness blush at the thought of him doing something drastic.
"Hey hey! You owe me one" Aqua cheered, casting her anti curse spell. Her happyness faded slightly as the curse stayed on Kazuma's forhead. "A-ahhh- that's a strong one... so... what does it do?" She asked.

Megumin cleared her throat, Kazuma suddenly realized she held the release papers.
"Oy oy! Don't tell her" Kazuma hissed, rushing over. Startled, Megumin held a hand up, touching his forhead.
"Frog!" She announced, his body suddenly vanishing. In his place, lay a bundle of clothes. An angry frog soon hopped out, glaring at Megumin who grinned high above as she continued to read in peace. "Touching the cursed symbol and saying an object or a small animal will turn him into it. Asking him to fuse with an item will merge the cursed with said item if it's close. Ah-" Megumin laughed, watching the frog pounce at her leg. "That's not so bad-!" the girl above cheered as Aqua scooped up the frog.

Thinking for a moment, she pinned Kazuma down with a finger before smiling
"I could use a drink-"

A little puff, a bottle of liqur appeared in her hand. She drooled,
"Kaaazuumaaa- this might be the best thing you've done!" the useless goddess stroked his form, popping open the cap. Kazuma paniced, what would happen if she drank him? Additionally, the symbol for transforming him was on the bottle cap- if they lost that then how would he turn back?

Thankfully, Darkness pulled him back, pressing the cap down and saying 'Kazuma', turning him back.(Much to Aqua's disappointment)

It was a slow walk back to the mansion for poor Kazuma as Megumin tried to cheer him up with all the pranks they could do. Darkness was promising she would protect him but her ditzyness seemed unassuring. Aqua however, was mostly just thinking up objects she could use around the house.

Once through the door and slipped into bed, Kazuma lay shaking on the bed as his mind raced.

being too embarrassed to use him for the rest
1411.content:
"Wait wait wait, Can I change myself? Ha! Maybe I can turn this around on that idiot Masochist if I can just figure it out maybe spy on them as a washcloth or-" And just like that Kazuma managed to say something while touching the curse mark, which then transformed him into it. A simple white washcloth with the symbol of transformation on it, well at least he had confirmed that it worked now all he had to do was change back... A few moments pass of Kazuma trying to move and or say something only to realize that he was neither animate or had a mouth with which to speak! This was a horrible flaw in his plan to take control of the curse somehow, and to make matters worse someone was coming into the room.

Darkness felt bad about landing Kazuma with a curse/blessing she had wanted for herself, and she was sure that if she did nothing either Aqua or Megumin would surely abuse the situation and Kazuma would suffer for it. She blushed imagining all the things that could now happen, what it must feel like! but she slapped her face to calm herself down before entering Kazuma's room, even if she might want those things Kazuma probably didn't and she could follow his wishes and protect him! Only, when she walked into the room Kazuma wasn't even in his bed, or at least she thought so at first. It only took her a little while to notice the washcloth on the pillow. "Kazuma?" A million thoughts raced through her head, she was sure none of the other girls had gotten there before her so the only person in the room that could have transformed him was himself but if he did it to himself did that mean he wanted to be transformed? He was a washcloth, so the place he should have transformed was the bathroom if he wanted to get used unless... Unless he wanted her to be the one that used him? She had decided to hold off on a bath so she could protect Kazuma, could he have predicted that! Darkness' face went red from thinking of how sweaty and humiliating it would be to be used to clean off someone else's sweat, and how embarrassing it would be to have Kazuma able to stare at her thought the whole bath. She lifted him off the pillow breathing heavily. Would she really do this?

Kazuma meanwhile was very concerned at the state of things, at first when Darkness was the one to find him he was thinking she would free him immediately but it was clear by the state of her that she had some perverted thing going through her head. She was walking into the bathroom too! She was actually going to use him as a washcloth! He was slung over a small bar while Darkness got undressed, red as a beet. As much as he didn't want to be used as an object Darkness did have the type of body he preferred so getting to see her naked was always a treat (unless she was being really weird) "K-kazuma I-I'm only doing this as a favor b-but after you have to tell me how it felt." The ragged breathing over his form told Kazuma there was something he definitely wasn't going to like about this.

The water was nice and warm as she daintily dipped him into it and pulled him out but didn't soak herself in the water proper, she intended to give 'maximum experience' with this so rather than simply soaking she was going to use the small washcloth to scrub herself down first. She started with the area that got worked relentlessly and was thus the dirtiest and sweatiest, her feet. Kazuma would have been screaming profanities at her if he could, as it was he was face first with her dirty feet and the sweat soaking into him felt as though he was directly licking them which would have been bad enough if Darkness hadn't decided the way to clean was roughly scrubbing him. She flossed him over the first foot, and between the toes before dipping him back in the water and wringing him out causing a feeling that was, well exactly that, being twisted and squeezed by the physically strongest person he knew. At this point rather than profanity Kazuma had resolved to mentally pleading for the oblivious girl to stop. She could neither hear him nor did she stop, bringing him to the other dirty foot to repeat the actions giving him another dose of her sweat and collected dirt and grime.

Darkness paused marveling at how well her feet had been cleaned by even the 'soft' scrubbing she gave them before...

"Such a beast- pushing me to use you o-on my body- f-fantasizing about- m-me and obje-objectifying-" She flushed red, scrubbing her feet harder. The harsh movement anything but gentle as the blonde got lost in her actions.

Kazuma was in torment, hoping the rest of her body would be more forgiving. I-I'm sorry-" She grabbed the poor dirty rag, walking quickly towards her clothes. "Wait! Change me back first!" Kazuma internally yelled "I don't wanna be labled a pervert for you perverted actions!" He fumed, trying to ignore the fact that he planned to spy on Darkness using this curse.

Waiting to be turned back dragged on a bit. He sat, bored in the corridor and smelling of feet as a door opened somewhere. With uninterested eyes, Kazuma watched as Aqua wandered towards him. He gazed, slightly disinterested up her skirt as she stood over him, testing the door.
"Occupied-" Darkness called forth. Aqua pouted, shifting her foot onto Kazuma. Once again, he was being abused by a girls foot,
"Don't get your panties in a twist-! I just want to grab some stuff!" She called out, stepping off Kazuma and noticing his new form.

Kazuma winced as Aqua stepped off him. Her sweaty toes wiping across his face before she moved- glancing down.
"Why feet...?" He asked, suddenly feeling waitless as he was picked up by the stupid goddess. He tried to flail as she smiled down at him, not noticing the symbol on the wasteband as she took him unwillingly inside.
"Ah- you didn't happen to see.. um- anything in the doorway?" Darkness blushed,

"Great- just leave the washcloth where it is for now- it's Kazuma... he..." Darkness shook her head, flushing red.
"Noooo! Don't say it like that-! I didn't do anything!" Kazuma internally cried as Aqua glared at a random washcloth.

Thus, leaving Darkness and Kazuma alone again as Darkness finished off her wash. Unheard and unable to control his fate, he was soon in the shadow of a naked Darkness.

It was the dead of the night when Kazuma awoke with a bad feeling in his gut. He carefully covered the curse mark before rolling over, only to see Megumin at his bed side.
"Shh-" She stated, grinning. "Alright, the curse thing sucks but- I think we can use it for some kinda prank or something"

Kazuma, nodded his head before opening his mouth,
"DARKNESS THERE'S-" He started, before the girl lunged out and covered his mouth with panic,
"It'll be fun! Come on! I can turn you into something unexpected then -boom you appear! O-or if we experiment around we might find a way to do it remotely- like- we turn you into something of Darknesses, she looks away then 'Boom' you're a chest of draws?" Megumin pleaded.
"Hai- panties please-" Kazuma stated, semi enjoying Megumin's disgusted expression.

After a couple of seconds of thought, Kazuma felt a grin cross his face.
"Hey hey- I have an idea. How about turning into Darkness's bra?" He stated, making Megumins face drop further.
"Y-your intentions are kinda showing pretty strongly... fine- if you let me turn you into a plush toy then I'll later turn you into some clothes..." Megumin crossed her fingers behind her back.

Originally he had been joking, but the temptation was pretty great now.
"... Fine-" Kazuma sighed, letting Megumin touch his forhead. "But only if I'm turned into-" the guy started,
"Too late! I just said clothes, not what kind of clothes!" The explosion wizard laughed, "Plush toy!"

Kazuma gave a little struggle as he glared at her,
"Hey, I was just about to-"

PUFF

Feeling words no longer come out, the poor otaku tried to move his limbs. His hands moved awkwardly infront of his face with concern, waving slightly in surprise as he found them to be stumps of fabric. He gazed down at his legs, the same thing occured, fabric stumps.
"Perfect! This is gonna freak them out!" Megumin boomed up above. The poor Plushy toy felt himself get roughly picked up, suddenly coming face to face with the excited prankster as he flailed around. "Great! Keep doing that, they'll totally run away when they see you coming!

Who was this prank intended for?

Aqua sighed, leaning on a wall as she waited for her peon to attract the monsters so she could escape. Not that she had explained that plan to Kazuma but she should be able to revive him so it's no big woop.

However- as she leant, something clicked- the wall opened.
"E-ehh? Wai-" The blue goddess called out, before tumbling down into the secret passage- sliding down some kind of slide. "KAAAZZUUUMAA!" She cried out, noticing Kazuma looking down at her as she slid away. He looked more fed up then worried for her safety as she fell down- landing safely in some strange room.

As the goddess prepared to cry, she suddenly noticed a super pretty fan on a pedestal. Her eyes lit up as she scanned the room for traps.
"Um- hello?" She asked, slowly wandering forward. Her fingers greedily flexed as she carefully wandered over, looking around.

Nothing to the left, nothing to the right. This must of been the loot some of the adventurers had spoken of, you usually had to defeat some kind of guardian to get it though. 142.title: Aqua

1423.content:
Aqua gazed upwards, a confused squeak bubbled up inside of her as she looked around.
"Isn't this-" Aqua furrowed her brow, noticing no sound coming out of her mouth as she spoke. It was Wiz's shop, for sure. "I KNEW WE COULDN'T TRUST THAT DAMN LI-"

Her rant went unheard as Wiz wandered into the room with a box. The bell to the shop rang out just as Aqua's unheard insults slowly tailed away as she noticed Wiz standing overhead.

Wiz slammed the heavy box down on the stool with a thud, panting slightly as she turned around. The poor stool seemed to shudder under the boxes weight as Wiz leaned against it.
"Oh- morning Yunyun" She beamed.

Aqua meanwhile had no idea what was going on, her body wobbled weakly under the box as she drowned out the talking above with her complaints. However, as soon as the box was removed, Aqua was ready to switch straight back into complain mode- before Wiz's dusty sole hovered over her.

CRREAAAAK

The stool whined under foot as Wtiz stood tall. Her boots scuffing the poor chair as Yunyun helped pass the box up. Neither knew of Aqua's horrified expression as she felt Wiz essentially use her face like a door mat. Worst of all, it felt like the shoe gunk was getting dumped directly into her mouth. She was at a loss for words, no complaints came out as Wiz stepped down and easily picked her up. It started to slowly click together as she was placed down again.

"I'M A STOOL?" She screamed out, just as Yunyun took a seat on her face.

With no knowledge of the chair being sentient, Wiz winced as Yunyun shifted on the creaky old stool.
"I'm sorry, let me get you a cushion" Wiz offered, but Yunyun waved her off-
"I-It's fine! Really. Thanks for all the help you've given, I think I can beat Megumin for sure!" She cheered, wiggling her hips happily as the chair groaned under her. Wiz winced a little, the stool did look uncomfortable.

143.content:
It was late during the night after having completed a quest, when Darkness rose from her sleeping bag, detecting a nearby explosion from one of Megumin spells being cast. She glanced over the campfire noticing the little Arch Wizard gone, as both Kazuma and Aqua remained vast asleep. Darkness quickly rose, grasping her sword, and left her party members by the fire to bring their caster back before something terrifying might happen.

"Megumin," Darkness called out, as she forced her way through a thorny bush, she could have taken a much more accessible path, but Darkness face was glowing red from the pleasure of prickling thorns stinging her. The sound of explosions grew heavier and brighter as Darkness grew closer to the action, "Megumin" cried out once more, this time with more concern, as she burst through the hedge witnessing her friend lying on the field, as a robed wizard stood on a hill laughing.

"So the little wizard of the Crimson Demon Clan isn't alone," the person spoke, removing their hood to reveal themselves to be Wolbach hiding beneath, "Splendid! Now I'll add both of you to my collection," her yellow eyes glowed as began chanting a spell. She slowly rose into the air, leaving Darkness to run to Megumin's aid.

"Are you hurt," Darkness asked, helping Megumin stand on her feet as they study the Goddess, producing a sinister ball before them.

Megumin softly smiled, "I'm okay. My explosive magic has injured me far worse than hers," she giggled, before stumbling forward, grabbing her staff to support herself, glimpsing to Darkness, Megumin saw her drooling and panting from the sheer excitement of imaging such pleasuring damage.

Wolbach snickered above, "Now prepare you two for my darkest curse I ever conceived that will leave you both helpless,"

Darkness heart raced while her body surfaced in a heavy sweat, "Leave me helpless?" it was like a dream come true for her, but she then looked to Megumin, who was scared of what's to come. Darkness smiled and took a running start just as Wolbach cast the spell, hitting her body with all the blunt force that followed behind it. Darkness shrieked with vigorous enjoyment as black lighting surged within her entire body that shocked her very soul, as the ball suddenly began growing smaller and tighter around her body, it sent Darkness into an overdrive of satisfaction before the sphere exploded.

Megumin watched as a momentarily tiny unconscious Darkness began to fall hitting the ground. "Aww, what a shame, and I seem to have used almost the last of my magic in that attack, but one of you is still better than nothing," Wolbach gloated, marching forward to collect her prize. Megumin, in a state of anger and desperation, used all her power left in one final explosive attack.

Wolbach quickly teleported away to dodge the attack, as the wind blew Darkness towards Megumin thankfully. "Irritating brat, Don't think I won't get her," Wolback promised before disappearing.

Megumin dropped her staff, "Darkness! Where are you," she called out, searching the rubble.

"Megumin!" Darkness fought too say.

"Where are you Darkness," Megumin asked again.

Darkness struggling to speak, "Below your foot,"

Megumin blushed as she lifted her foot that was crushing her tiny friend. She immediately panicked observing Darkness feet flat, but they quickly popped back to normal as she proceeds to picked her up, "I'm so sorry Darkness,"

Darkness face exhausted with redness, not from the battle, but the thrill of being stepped on like a bug from her teammate, "It's fine, just give me a sec," Darkness exclaimed happily.

"Look at you! You're tiny and feel boneless," Megumin illustrated, seeing Darkness smile and jiggle without fear of the situation, "Let's get you back to the others,"

Darkness snapped out of her daze of humiliation catching Megumin's plan, "What let's not worry the others just yet? I mean, maybe it'll wear off in a day?" Darkness blushed slowly, hoping to have the side effect last a bit longer if possible.

"Darkness!" Megumin signed, "I'm at least telling Aqua in the morning. Now, where am I even going to hide you from Kazuma?"

Darkness blushed, glancing towards her teammate's legs, "I know one place."

Megumin gasped, "No! I'm not keeping you in there!" but Darkness begging wore Megumin down. "Just don't move so much around, alright." Megumin blushed snapping Darkness inside.

Darkness couldn't believe what was happing being shrunken was utterly humiliating, and it made her heart race. She couldn't wait to have some more coming the next morning. When suddenly she felt weird, and the tingling running through her body returned as she passed out, Meguminn had made her way into her sleeping bag were..
143.title: Darkness's humliating curse

info.brief_description: Some Shrinking and TF shinanigans with the cast of Konosuba
info.description:
Gods blessing on this wonderful world!

Welcome to the Konosuba Shrunk and Transformed Interactive, I haven't seen one dedicated to it out there but the characters really are too great to be hidden away in a generic Anime Interactive (and also it's not there I checked).

Here is a list of the characters, also feel free to use the succubus cause they exist but these are the main characters https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_KonoSuba_characters

MAIN CHARACTER CANT DIE, at least not in the first couple of chapters, when crushed they just flatten out or something.

A Few Small Rules! That I ripped right from Teniko's RWBY interactive thanks Teniko I basically agree with your rules anyhow and it's faster to do this than try and think of every little thing

This is just for writers, I don't want to put anyone off buuuuut there are a few things I want to keep out of the story-

1. The main character can't die unless specified in the starting text. The default as a whole- flatten out and stretch- kind of thing. Vore deaths are an exception-

2. OC's- I don't want a tiny OC running in to save the day- try and stick with the main cast as much as possible, perhaps throwing in a random student here and there without going into it too much. This includes naming the nameless main character in the stories where you play yourself (Sorry if you wished to be female in these chapters, it's not possible to make a 100% blank canvas character)

3. I won't allow diapers- it's just not my cup of tea.

4. Transformations are object based only! Sorry if you came here for Age regression or something like that!

5. Toilet stuff, fart and such, are allowed but only if you add a bold T to the title of the chapter. Not everyone likes that stuff

6. Try and keep it fairly close to cannon at the start of stories/ try and keep shippings subtle. I've allowed a few arks to go up with this before I made the rule as the contents pretty good but I don't want a shipping war spread across the interactive ^_^

7. No unbirthing- insertions fine, going into the womb is fine, but turning into a baby is classed as age regression to me :P

8. Finally- small chapters or chapters that I feel aren't good enough shall be deleted if I think it doesn't fit. I'll also block off chapters if I think it's going to go into a constant stream of 'How about this character?' with a bunch of empty chapters in between.

Hope the rules don't put you off! Any questions and such, please don't hesitate to message me :P
